name: Troubleshooting Chatbot
desc: A web-based AI chatbot that helps users diagnose and resolve technical issues using NLP. Built with JavaScript and Flask, it analyzes queries, detects intent, and offers solutions with support for sentiment, entities, and fallback escalation.

name: Warehouse Robotics Simulation
desc: An AI-driven Python simulation for warehouse management using autonomous robots. The system uses intelligent task allocation, conflict resolution, and reward-based learning to optimize item retrieval and restocking in a multi-agent environment.
